Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Ohio
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand & Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Albany.
ShortDescription: #20 Madison buses temp rrtd WB buses will operate via Madison, California, Washington, & Kedzie; EB buses will operate via Madison, Kedzie, Warren, & California

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Madison/Albany.

Westbound buses will operate via Madison, California, Washington, Kedzie and then resume their normal route on Madison.

Eastbound buses will operate via Madison, Kedzie, Warren, California and then resume their normal route on Madison.

Allow extra travel time.
